name: DRASIL
description:
Drasil, the wishing tree, was a symbol of prosperity and faith.

Now, it is but a corpse filled with nightmares.

Drasil is a metroidvania with turn-based combat and sideview scrolling, in a big interconnected world filled with secrets, items, ennemies and NPCs to meet during your journey.

You play as Ganelon, a wandering knight who seek to find Drasil, the wishing tree, to makes his dream come true. Yet, the realm where the tree resides is attacked by a nightmarish fog, who turns the inhabitants of the kingdom into deformed and mad creatures. It is up to you, and the friends you'll make along the way, to find a cure to this curse and to heal the wishing tree.

GAME INPUTS :

Arrow keys : move around.

Z or ENTER : interact with the world around you.

ESCAPE or X : cancel certains actions or open the main menu.

INSPIRATION :

The game takes inspiration from several games, such as OFF, Lisa and Vomitoreum. It is also inspired by certain artists like Zdzisław Beksiński or Salvador Dali. There's also references to the roundtable knights, the french twelve paladins and alchemy.
